answers.answer: Yeah my last son as born at 35 weeks w iugr. I'm extremely nervous about it again this time

Yes I know exactly how you feel! This is my 4th and I've never carried to term due to preeclampsia and I worried my head off about getting it this time. Low and behold I have bigger problems than that now I have complete placenta previa and have been on bed rest for 6weeks now! Just trying to keep her cooking!
Im glad Im not alone.. & Congrats mommies!! We have to think positive :-) We'll make it further than we did before!!  Thank you @mommieK4times

question: Has anyone else not been able to fully enjoy their pregnancy because you've had a baby prematurely before? My doctor doesn't seem worried. & I try to minimize how I feel about it because I don't want my husband worried that I'm worried.. But I am.. What about you?
title: Previous Premature Baby/Babies?
